articles.title: SP Global Ratings downgrades Future Retail to #39;SD#39; after default
articles.description: Future Retail Ltd failed to make the principal payments due on its restructured domestic bank borrowings on December 31, 2021. The 30-day review period (grace period to pay) allowed by the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has ended, S&P said in a statement.
articles.content:
S&P Global Ratings on Wednesday downgraded Future Retail Ltds long-term issuer credit rating from 'CCC-' to 'SD' after the company failed to repay the principal on its debt.
